Talents Wanted at Hefei Institutes of Physical Science...

Biotechnology, also known as biotechnology, refers to the use of living organisms (cells containing animals, plants and microorganisms) to produce useful substances or improve processes, improve biological characteristics, reduce costs and create new species. Depending on the tools and applications, it often overlaps with the fields of bioengineering and biomedical engineering.
